backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user, supplier, product, category, order, cart, and Stripe integration logic with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping redirect logic requirements to affected frontend files and components with high‑confidence traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including routing, pages, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes plus global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router layout handling Internet Identity auth, onboarding redirect precedence, and conditional landing vs authenticated UI.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Fullscreen access gate prompting unauthenticated users to log in with Internet Identity.
Admin‑only button that seeds demo products via addProduct mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with dynamic year, caffeine.ai attribution link, and placeholder legal links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header showing links, cart count, and authentication actions based on user and supplier status.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer with navigation links and a dynamic copyright line linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Landing page header with logo and a button that scrolls to and focuses the email input section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, email, and supplier option, submitting data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/seller/ProductFo: Dialog for adding or editing products, managing form fields, images, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerPro: Displays seller products with options to edit, update stock, or delete items, plus loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal prompting Stripe secret key and allowed countries to configure payment settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state and exposing login, logout, and identity info.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods including profiles, suppliers, Stripe config, and checkout sessions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and utility classes for layout and visual styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart UI with quantity updates, removal, totals, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Loads cart items, calculates totals, and creates Stripe checkout sessions before redirecting the user.
frontend/src/pages/CreateStorePage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing a supplier store, using queries to load and save supplier profile data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, email capture, Internet Identity login flow, and marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancellation message with options to return to cart or retry checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a payment confirmation message with links to home or product browsing.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product catalog with search, sorting, filtering, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Seller dashboard showing store stats, product list, and management actions with store creation fallback.
frontend/src/pages/StoreViewPage.tsx: Storefront page displaying supplier details and product list with add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/pages/SuppliersPage.tsx: Lists all suppliers with product counts and navigation to their stores or filtered products.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Exports static asset paths used throughout the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides helpers to store, fetch, and clear onboarding email and redirect targets in sessionStorage, including an atomic consume method.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Returns product or cart item image URLs, falling back to a placeholder when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read URL parameters (including from hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, supporting routing-related state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme tokens, colors, spacing, animations, plugins, and extended styles for the app.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, issues, and feature list for building a Shopify-like multi-store platform.
